'''Mighty Morphin Power Rangers'''<ref>{{Mcnet|power-rangers-come-console-pocket-and-windows-10|Power Rangers come to Console, Pocket and Windows 10!|March 28, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] crossing over with ''[[w:Mighty Morphin Power Rangers|Mighty Morphin Power Rangers]]'', the first season of the long-running ''Power Rangers'' tokusatsu franchise, based off of the Japanese show ''[[w:Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger|Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger]]'' of the ''Super Sentai'' franchise. The skin pack was delisted on March 31, 2020.

|[[w:Trini Kwan|Yellow Ranger]]
|[[File:Yellow Ranger skin render.png|60px]]
|Trini Kwan, the first yellow ranger to appear in ''Power Rangers''.
|Trini's counterpart in the ''Sentai'' series, [https://powerrangers.fandom.com/wiki/Dime_Tribe_Knight_Boi Boi], was notably male. In order to have a stronger gender ratio, he was ironically traded for a female character.

|[[w:Zack Taylor| Black Ranger]]
|[[File:Black Ranger skin render.png|60px]]
|Zack Taylor, the first black ranger to appear in ''Power Rangers''.
|
|-
|[[w:Tommy Oliver|Green Ranger]]
|[[File:Green Ranger skin render.png|60px]]
|Tommy Oliver, the first green ranger to appear in ''Power Rangers'' and sixth member of the ''Mighty Morphin Power Rangers''.
|In tokusatsu series, it is common for there to be an additional hero to join after the founding of the team, usually a fourth or sixth member. Tommy was notable for being the very first in ''Power Rangers'', with his equivalent in ''Zyuranger'', [https://powerrangers.fandom.com/wiki/Yamato_Tribe_Knight_Burai Burai], sharing a similar honor.
|-
|White Ranger
|[[File:White Ranger skin render.png|60px]]
|Tommy Oliver, the former green ranger and first white ranger to appear in ''Power Rangers''.
|Tommy would become notable for being the longest serving hero in the franchise, taking on various other mantles across ''[[w:Power Rangers Zeo|Power Rangers Zeo]]'', ''[[w:Power Rangers Turbo|Power Rangers Turbo]]'', and ''[[w:Power Rangers Dino Thunder|Power Rangers Dino Thunder]]''. The white ranger was the first time he took on an additional persona, using a suit from ''[[w:Gosei Sentai Dairanger|Gosei Sentai Dairanger]]''.
